channel.title: plot on Practical R
channel.description: Recent content in plot on Practical R

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Data Visualization Figure 1 Data Science Figure 2 Introduction Are you struggling to learn R so you can create beautiful and effect data visualizations and produce data science projects that add value? You are not alone. Analyzing data is now common to a lot of professions that may not have any background in programming or computer science. Are you full of excitement for your new R project but finding it difficult to quickly achieve the results you want and need? Coming from a background in other programming languages may be problematic because R does some things a little bit differently. Are you taking a course in R and finding that you canâ€™t keep up with the class and need some background? Or are you just interested in learning more about R and what R can do?
